name: Let's Go Brandon Coin
description:
Coin that embodies the chant from the crowds for freedom of speech, fun and sportsmanship.
There is a time lock of 24 hours for the investor to be able to release the tokens to its wallet.
Every day there is a 1% reduction on the amount of tokens received per USDC invested. This way USDCs can be invested in profitable operations and with the profits, the executive team will be able to conduct the monetary policy.
